snippet: Three civil rights workers who were killed by Ku Klux Klansmen in 1964 are going to be posthumously awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom, but the honor makes some of their relatives uneasy....

headline.print_headline: Relatives Question Honor for Civil Rights Workers
headline.main: Relatives Question Honor for Civil Rights Workers

lead_paragraph: Three civil rights workers who were killed by Ku Klux Klansmen in 1964 are going to be posthumously awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom, but the honor makes some of their relatives uneasy.
